alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:12PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Spartanburg and northwestern Cherokee Counties through 445 PM EST... At 412 PM EST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or near Reidville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Boiling Springs SC, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Mayo, Chesnee, Reidville, Cowpens National Battlefield and GSP Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
